The DT the first RB first occurred VBD occur in IN in 1556 CD @card@ , , , when WRB when the DT the Earl NNP earl of IN of Sussex NNP Sussex dispossessed VBD dispossess the DT the O'More NNP O'More clan NN clan from IN from the DT the area NN area and CC and attempted VBD attempt to TO to replace VB replace them PRP them with IN with English NNP English settlers NNS settler . . .

Neither IN neither plantation NN plantation was VBD be fully RB fully successful JJ successful due JJ due to TO to a DT a lack NN lack of IN of tenants NNS tenant and CC and because IN because of IN of continuous JJ continuous raids NNS raid and CC and attacks NNS attack by IN by the DT the O'Mores NNPS O'Mores . . .

Finally RB finally , , , the DT the county NN county became VBD become home NN home to TO to a DT a community NN community of IN of French NNP French Huguenots NNPS Huguenot in IN in the DT the 1690s NNS 1690s , , , who WP who were VBD be settled VBN settle in IN in Ireland NNP Ireland after IN after their PRP$ their service NN service to TO to William NNP William of IN of Orange NNP Orange in IN in the DT the Williamite NNP williamite war NN war in IN in Ireland NNP Ireland . . .

The DT the population NN population of IN of County NNP County Laois NNP Laois is VBZ be expanding VBG expand rapidly RB rapidly , , , given VBN give its PRP$ its easy JJ easy commute NN commute to TO to Dublin NNP Dublin and CC and affordable JJ affordable housing NN housing in IN in pleasant JJ pleasant surroundings NNS surroundings . . .

In IN in the DT the 2006 CD @card@ census NN census the DT the population NN population had VBD have increased VBN increase by IN by 14 CD @card@ % NN % to TO to 67,000 CD @card@ people NNS people . . .
